org.ardenus.graphics.shader

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.shader.Shader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable

    public class Shader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deletable
    Represents a shader in OpenGL that can be loaded using the Resource classes.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin.

      • printShaderSource

        private static void printShaderSource(java.lang.String source,
                                      java.io.PrintStream out)
        Prints the shader source code to the specified stream.

      • compileAndAttachShader

        private int compileAndAttachShader(int shaderType,
                                   java.lang.String shaderName)
                            throws ShaderException
        Compiles and attaches the specified shader to the program.
        Parameters:
        shaderType - the type of the shader (GL_XXX_SHADER).
        shaderName - the name of the shader entry that will be used to retrieve the source code.
        Returns:
        the shader ID.
        Throws:
        ShaderException - if compilation of the shader fails.

      • setUniform

        public <T> boolean setUniform(java.lang.String name,
                              T value)
        Sets the value of a uniform.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of value the uniform is.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the uniform to set.
        value - the new value of the uniform.
        Returns:
        true if the uniform was set, false otherwise.
